intro: I'm a design-minded front-end software engineer focused on building beautiful interfaces & experiences

about.detail: building things for the web with some awesome people. I've graduated from Charotar University of Science and Technology, and got chance to work with Novatrice and Techflitter.
about.detailSecond: As a software engineer, I enjoy bridging the gap between engineering and design — combining my technical knowledge with my keen eye for design to create a beautiful product.
about.detailThird: My goal is to always build applications that are scalable and efficient under the hood while providing engaging, pixel-perfect user experiences.
about.skills: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

contact.message: My inbox is always open, Whether you have any suggestions or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
